name: Venture Forth
description: Venture Forth is an extremely challenging adventure game with a retro 90s shooter vibe. Forge your own path within its labyrinthine caves but beware the danger lurking around every corner.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP Processor: 2 GHz Dual Core Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: OpenGL 3.0 Storage: 200 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: 2.3 GHz+, Quad Core Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: OpenGL 3.3+, 256MB+ Storage: 200 MB available space
